targets.expr:
sort_desc(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", interface=~"$interface"}[$interval:$resolution])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$data_plane"}) by (workload, interface))

sort_desc(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", interface=~"$interface"}[$interval:$resolution])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$data_plane"}) by (workload, interface))

panels.title: Number of failed initial registrations at the AMF

* on (namespace, pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$ues"}) by (workload, interface))

group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload=~"$data_control"}) by (pod, workload, interface))
